About me

Hello! My name is Mario Yordanov and I'm an aspiring web developer, specializing in technologies like JavaScript, Express, React and more.

My professional experience is in print as a prepress specialist (six years and counting), occasionally leading my own projects as a managing editor.

All my free time nowadays is spend learning how to build dynamic, scalable and fun to use web apps. I study JavaScript with the help of the great teachers at the Software University and building projects on my own.

Projects

Schmoo Social

Schmoo Social is a simple social media web app for sharing the best (and shortest!) silly jokes on the internet. It's created by me solely as a training exercise in web development.

Tech stack: JavaScript, Lit (web components), Page (routing), Back4App (backend), webpack (bundler)

Live Demo   Github Project

Sudoku

Hey, you know Sudoku! The objective is to fill a 9 × 9 grid with digits so that each column, row, and the nine 3 × 3 subgrids contain all of the digits from 1 to 9.

An improvised experiment in JavaScript with three predefined difficulties and an algorithm that checks if the solution is correct.
